TopicTitle: Parts should look damaged after a crash.

Articles.Content: I always thought that it looks really strange when your rockets explode but the parts that survive look good as new. In KSP2, I think it'd be good if the devs make it so that surviving parts look damaged. Maybe just an overlay.
perhaps this mod will help (a bit old, might not work on latest version)
yhea probably not mesh deformation but texture changes yhea. and example if you land on duna your parts get a bit covered with red dust.

This would have to be implemented with some sort of texture generation, because adding up to a few dozen textures for each part would blow up the file size and make adding parts with mods much harder. And I think that if it is added, it will be a mod because that small level of detail would not be implemented in the base game.
